name: Paracetamol
description: Used to relieve mild to moderate pain and reduce fever.

name: Ibuprofen
description: A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) for pain, fever, and inflammation.

name: Cetirizine
description: An antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms such as runny nose and itchy eyes.

name: Atorvastatin
description: Helps lower cholesterol levels and reduce the risk of heart disease.

name: Amoxicillin
description: A broad-spectrum antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.

name: Metformin
description: Used to control blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes.

name: Omeprazole
description: A proton pump inhibitor that reduces stomach acid and treats GERD.

name: Salbutamol
description: A bronchodilator used to relieve symptoms of asthma and other lung conditions.

name: Alprazolam
description: Used to treat anxiety and panic disorders.

name: Lisinopril
description: An ACE inhibitor used to manage high blood pressure and heart failure.

name: Rosuvastatin
description: Used to lower cholesterol and prevent cardiovascular disease.

name: Clopidogrel
description: Prevents blood clots in patients with cardiovascular conditions.

name: Levothyroxine
description: Treats hypothyroidism by replacing thyroid hormones.

name: Duloxetine
description: Used for depression, anxiety, and chronic pain management.

name: Adalimumab
description: Treats autoimmune diseases like rheumatoid arthritis and psoriasis.

name: Fluoxetine
description: An SSRI antidepressant used for depression, OCD, and panic disorders.

name: Metoprolol
description: A beta-blocker that manages high blood pressure and angina.

name: Warfarin
description: An anticoagulant used to prevent and treat blood clots.

name: Fexofenadine
description: An antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms.

name: Hydrochlorothiazide
description: A diuretic used to treat high blood pressure and fluid retention.
